servinfo.title: Transmission Warning Light Operation Check (Vehicle is Equipped with Engine Diagnosis Connector)

s1.ptxt: Check that transmission warning light lights for about 2 – 4 sec. and then goes OFF. If anything faulty is found, advance Transmission Warning Light Circuit Check – Light Does Not Come “ON” at Ignition Switch ON (Vehicle is equipped with engine diagnosis connector) or Transmission Warning Light Circuit Check – Light Remains “ON” at Ignition Switch ON (Vehicle is equipped with engine diagnosis connector) .
